name: Zorua

evolution.description: Zorua can evolve into Zoroark at level 8 and above. When it evolves, its health increases by double its level, and it gains 15 points to add to its ability scores (max 20).

description: The Tricky Fox Pokémon. To protect themselves from danger, they hide their true identities by transforming into people and Pokémon.

abilities.name: Illusion
abilities.description: This Pokémon can take the visual form of any Pokémon it can see. It can do this a number of times per long rest equal to its level. This illusion lasts for one hour or until the Pokémon is hit by a damaging move.
